Dublin Core:Title: Blank Park Zoo Master Plan, Des Moines, Iowa
Dublin Core:Description: This plan sought to develop and confirm strategic goals for the zoo and provide a planning framework for detailed design and development. This document includes part of the published plan, particularly the "character sketches" that includes artwork showing development themes.
Dublin Core:Creator: RDG Crose Gardner Shukert, nc. with Bassett Associates as zoo planning consultants
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: The Australian Adventure, Children's Zoo Fund Drive
Dublin Core:Description: An explanation of the plans for creating the Australian Adventure addition to support a capital fund drive. The zoo is located in Ft. Wayne, Indiana.
Dublin Core:Creator: Bassett Associates and Earl B. Wells
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Zoo 2000: Growing by Leaps and Bounds (The Campaign for the Greenville Zoo)
Dublin Core:Description: An explanation of the plans for enlarging this Greenvill, South Carolina zoo based on an updated master plan.
Dublin Core:Creator: Bassett Associates
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: A Botanical Master Plan for the Louisville Zoo, Our Natural Resource
Dublin Core:Description: The Botanical Master Plan highlights a landscape development that will complement the implementation of the physical master plan for this zoo in Louisville, Kentucky.
Dublin Core:Creator: Bassett Associates and William Ray & Associates
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Miller Park Zoo
Dublin Core:Description: A plan to integrate education, recreation, and conservation with active visitor participation to support revenue-producing activities for this zoo in Bloomington, Illinois.
Dublin Core:Creator: Earl B. Wells and James H. Bassett, Inc.
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Potter Park and Zoo, Lansing, Michigan: Master Plan of Redevelopment
Dublin Core:Description: A plan to increase visitor awareness and understanding of animals, and to reorganize vehicular and pedestrian circulation, parking, activity and service areas.
Dublin Core:Creator: James H. Bassett, Inc. and Earl B. Wells
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Tautphaus Park Zoo Master Plan
Dublin Core:Description: A plan prepared for the Citiy of Idaho Falls, Idaho to offer visitors a unique experience and to redevelop the zo with better parking and circulation.
Dublin Core:Creator: Bassett Associates and Earl B. Wells
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license

Dublin Core:Title: Willow Park Zoo 2004-2015 Master Plan
Dublin Core:Description: A guiding document for Logan, Utah for future development of a ten year period.
Dublin Core:Creator: Bassett Associates and Earl B. Wells
Dublin Core:Rights: Available under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license
